svg.text: SDD Workflow: Enterprise Integration Points v2
Comprehensive MCP integration mapping with observability and incident feedback loops

g.text: â€¢ Datadog: Metrics, logs, traces, APM
â€¢ SLO/SLI tracking â†’ Architecture review
â€¢ Postmortems â†’ Feed back to CLARIFY
â€¢ Pattern analysis â†’ Architecture updates
â€¢ Edge case discovered â†’ CLARIFY
â€¢ Security vuln â†’ ANALYZE + IMPLEMENT
â€¢ AI training data sufficient for research â€” Context7 + Perplexity
â€¢ No legacy constraints â€” clean architecture decisions
â€¢ Technology choices are yours â€” full stack control
â€¢ Focus: Learn spec discipline first, then layer enterprise tooling
â€¢ Must query live systems â€” Jira, Confluence, ServiceNow via MCP
â€¢ Incident patterns shape architecture â€” PagerDuty postmortems
â€¢ CVE verification mandatory â€” Snyk + Perplexity before any dep
â€¢ Observability-first â€” Datadog integration from PLAN phase
â€¢ Added Slack/ServiceNow for approval flows â€¢ Added PagerDuty/Datadog for observability feedback loops â€¢ Added explicit DEPLOY phase with progressive delivery
â€¢ Organized external systems by function (Requirements, Research, Security, Infrastructure, Observability) â€¢ Added Terraform for IaC bridging PLANâ†”IMPLEMENT
